name: Bolsa de Ofertas
tag_list: bolsa-de-ofertas, peixe-urbano, groupon, clickon, saveme, compras-coletivas, compra-coletiva, sites, agregadores, ofertas, descontos, promoes, ecommerce, brazil, so-paulo, rio-de-janeiro, copa-2014
overview: Bolsa de Ofertas is the first and largest Latin American trade publishing site location. It was founded in Brazil in October 2010, by Eduardo Cledson A.Eduardo Faust and Faust. The site is the largest internet portal on news of everything that happens in the world of websites for local businesses in Brazil and worldwide. For local businesses, is a powerful market information for local businesses, which helps the perception of the latest sector in Brazil and worldwide.
